DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial will compare the growth and tolerance of infants who consume an investigational cow's milk-based infant formula to those who consume a marketed cow's milk-based infant formula through approximately 4 months of age.
DOC.brief_title: Growth and Tolerance of Healthy Term Infants Fed Cow's Milk-Based Infant Formulas
DOC.criteria: Singleton 1014 days of age at randomization Term infant with birth weight of minimum of 2500 grams Solely formula fed Signed informed consent and protected health information History of underlying metabolic or chronic disease, anemia, or immune compromise Feeding difficulties or formula intolerance
